name: TeleBridge
description: TeleBridge is an ERC20 project that enables you to exchange crypto in under 5 minutes, without having to leave Telegram. Telebridge also introduced an anonymous and secure mobile app called Telechange that can be used to exchange between multiple cryptocurrencies on different blockchains safely, securely and in less than 5 minutes. $TB is the ERC20 token used as a payment token for the app. Telebridge offers two bots, one offering a mixer, and the other offering a bridge, all through telegram. Link to telegram bots: Bridge bot: https://t.me/telebridgingbot Mixer bot: https://t.me/telemixerbot
